GK16visah__u:2: granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅbhayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visah__u:5: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visah__u:8: caturvargaphalaprāptihi kovyato “rāmādivatpravatitavyaṃ na rāvaṇādivat” ityādiḥ kṛtyākṛtyapravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇa supratītaiva /
GK16visah__u:14: “ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati” ityādivedavākyebhyaśca suprasiddhaiva /
GK16visah__u:18: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visah__u:20: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam /
GK16visah__u:21: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ?
GK16visah__u:31: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visah__u:38: “nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visah__u:39: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ” //
GK16visah__u:41: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visah__u:43: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet,
GK16visah__u:45: yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visah__u:46: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi sarvameva kāvyam /
GK16visah__u:54: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt, sarvathā nirdeṣasyaikāntamasaṃbhavāt /
GK16visah__u:55: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi “īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam” ityukte nirdeṣayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visah__u:59: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visah__u:67: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya “ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ” ityādinā tenaiva pratipāditatvāt /
GK16visah__u:70: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ?
GK16visah__u:71: nāsti cet, guṇavattvamapi nāsti, guṇānāṃ tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt /
GK16visah__u:72: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visah__u:73: guṇavattvānyathānupapattyaitallabhyata iti cet ? tarhi sarasāvityeva vaktuṃ yuktam , na saguṇāviti /
GK16visah__u:75: nanu “śabdārthau saguṇau” ityanenaguṇābhivyañjakau śabdārthau kāvye prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ?
GK16visah__u:76: na, guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthavattvasya kāvye utkaṣamātrādhāyakatvam , na tu svarūpādhāyakatvam /
GK16visah__u:84: etena “analaṅkṛtī punaḥ kvāpi” iti yaduktam, tadapi parāstam /
GK16visah__u:85: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visah__u:90: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visah__u:91: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate //
GK16visah__u:97: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati” //
GK16visah__u:100: “kāvyasyātmā dhvaniḥ“-- iti tatkiṃ vastvalaṅkārarasādilakṣaṇāstirūpo dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā,
GK16visah__u:104: nanu yadi rasādirūpamātro dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā, tadā--
GK16visah__u:105: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visah__u:106: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visah__u:107: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visah__u:110: anyathā “devadatto grāmaṃ yāti” iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya tadanusaraṇarūpavyaṅgyāvagaterapi kāvyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:111: astviti cet ? na, rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visah__u:112_0: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ
GK16visah__u:119: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ?
GK16visah__u:120: na, rasavatpadyāntargatanīrasapadānāmiva padyarasena, prabandharaseneva teṣāṃ rasavattāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visah__u:121: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visah__u:135: “rasyate iti rasaḥ” iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visah__u:136: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanai- rnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visah__u:137: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visah__u:150: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visah__u:165: dehadvāreṇova śabdārthadvāreṇa tasyaiva kāvyasyātmabhūtaṃ rasamutkarṣayantaḥ kāvyasyotkarṣakā ityucyante /
GK16visah__u:166: iha yadyapi guṇānāṃ rasadharmatvaṃ tathāpiguṇaśabdo 'tra guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthayorupacaryate /
GK16visah__u:167: ataśca “guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ” ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visah__u:175: padoccayasyaitadabhāve 'pi vākyatve “vahninā siñciti” ityādyapi vākyaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:178: nirākāṅkṣasya vākyatve “gauraśvaḥ puruṣo istī” ityādīnāmapa vākyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visah__u:180: buddhivicchede 'pi vākyatve idānīmuccāritasya devadattaśabdasya dinātnaro ccāritena gacchatīti padena saṅgatiḥ syāt /
GK16visah__u:202: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśca vyaṅgyaśceti tridhā mataḥ // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visah__u:205: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syustistraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visah__u:208: uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya “gāmānaya” ityukte taṃ gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya “sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ” iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate,
GK16visah__u:209: anantaraṃ ca “gāṃ badhāna” “aśvamānaya” ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya “sāsnādimānarthaḥ” ānayanapadasya ca “āharaṇamarthaḥ” iti saṃketamavadhārayati /
GK16visah__u:214: taṃ ca saṅketitamarthaṃ bodhayantī śabdasya śaktyantarānantaritā śaktirabhidhā nāma /
GK16visah__u:215: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇadravyakriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visah__u:218: śuklādayo hi gavādiraṃ sajātīyebhyaḥ kṛṣṇagavādibhyo vyāvartayanti /
GK16visah__u:222: eṣveva hi vyakterupādhiṣu saṃketo gṛhyate, na vyaktauḥ ānantyavyabhicāradoṣāpātāt /
GK16visah__u:227: ñasaṃbhavan yayā śabdaśaktyā svasaṃyuktān puruṣādīn pratyāyayati,
GK16visah__u:228: yayā ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte 'saṃbhavan svasya sāmīpyādisaṃbandhasaṃbandhinaṃ taṭādiṃ bodhayati,
GK16visah__u:229: sā śabdasyārpitā svābhaviketarā īśvarānudbhāvitā vā śaktirlakṣaṇā nāma /
GK16visah__u:231: uttaratra “gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣaḥ” iti pratipādanālabhyasya śītatvapāvanatvātiśayasya bodhanarūpaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visah__u:232: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt, ityuktam--
GK16visah__u:236: kuśāṃllātīti vyutpattilabhyaḥ kuśagrāhirūpo mukhyor'thaḥ prakṛte 'saṃbhavan vivecakatvādisādharmyasambandhasambandhinaṃ dakṣarūpamarthaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visah__u:240: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve “gauḥ śete” ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visah__u:241: “gamerḍeḥ” (uṇādi--2-67) iti gamadhatorḍepratyayena vyutpāditasya gośabdasya śayanakāle prayogāt /
GK16visah__u:249: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visah__u:250: pūrvatra prayojanābhāvādrūḍhiḥ, uttaratra tu kuntādīnāmatigahanatvaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visah__u:260: “apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visah__u:261: vidadhadīdṛśameva sadā sakhe ! sukhitamāssva tataḥ śaradāṃ śatam” //
GK16visah__u:270: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visah__u:306: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visah__u:308: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu“ete rājakumārā gacchanti” /
GK16visah__u:312: “rājakumārā gacchanti” rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sārepā gauṇī yathā--
GK16visah__u:324: kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visah__u:338: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visah__u:342: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram /
GK16visah__u:344: śuklapaṭayostu nātyantaṃ bhedapratītiḥ, tasmādevamādiṣu śuddhaiva lakṣaṇā /
GK16visah__u:346: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visah__u:356: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visah__u:358: “strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visah__u:359: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16visah__u:360: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visah__u:375_1: tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate
GK16visah__u:400: “bhāti rathāṅgam” rathāṅgam” iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visah__u:401: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visah__u:404: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva” iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti, tanna; tathāhi--
GK16visah__u:405: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti,
GK16visah__u:407: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16visah__u:408: tadā tathāvidhasthale śleṣānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ; na ca tathā,
GK16visah__u:413: evamekasminnarthe 'bhidhayā niyantrite yā śabdārthasyānyārthabuddhihetuḥ śaktiḥ sābhidhāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visah__u:415: “durgālaṅghitavigraho manasijaṃ saṃmīlayaṃstejasā prodyadrājakalo gṛhītagarimā viṣvagvṛto bhogibhiḥ /
GK16visah__u:416: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:417: atra prakaraṇonābhidhayā umāvallabhaśabdasyomānāmnīmahādevīvallabhabhānudevanṛpatirūper'the niyantrite vyañjanayaiva gaurīvallabharūpor'tho bodhyate /
GK16visah__u:421: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visah__u:422: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visah__u:428: “kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visah__u:429: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya” //
GK16visah__u:430: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate /
GK16visah__u:432: “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visah__u:433: mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikm” //
GK16visah__u:434: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visah__u:435: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visah__u:441: ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visah__u:448: atra naiṣyati, api tarhi eṣyatyeveti kākkā vyajyate--
GK16visah__u:452: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visah__u:456: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-“kālo madhuḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visah__u:472: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visah__u:473: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visah__u:476: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
GK16visah__u:484: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visah__u:486: “rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:487: atra ca ratyādipadopādānādeva prāpte sathāyitve punaḥ sthāyipadopādānaṃ ratyādīnāmapi rasāntaraṣvasthāyitvapratipādanārtham /
GK16visah__u:496: “rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate” ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visah__u:499: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visah__u:514: tathāpi “rasaḥ svādyate” iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā prayogaḥ /
GK16visah__u:515: taduktam-“rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:517: nanvetāvatā rasasyājñeyatvamuktaṃ bhavatīti vyañjanāyāśca jñānaviśeṣatvād dvayoraikyamāpatitam /
GK16visah__u:521: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet, satyamuktam /
GK16visah__u:524: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ” iti /
GK16visah__u:526: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ ) na syādatyucyate--
GK16visah__u:531: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visah__u:532: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visah__u:539: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visah__u:541: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visah__u:542_0: ye khalu rāmavanavāsādayo loke “duḥkhāraṇāni” ityucyante ta eva hi kāvyanāṭyasamarpitā
GK16visah__u:543: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visah__u:544: ataśca “laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante” iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ /
GK16visah__u:545: kāvye puna) “sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate” iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ /

GK16visah__u:6572: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me” //
GK16visah__u:6573_0: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”
GK16visah__u:6573_1: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
GK16visah__u:6574: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /
GK16visah__u:6576: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visah__u:6578: samādhyalaṅkāre tvekakāryaṃ prati sādhake samagre 'pyanyasya kākatālīyanyāyenāpatanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6579: “aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visah__u:6580: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6584: patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra ! teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6604: “tadvaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ceddyutiḥ;
GK16visah__u:6606: dhikkandarpadhanurbhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6611: “ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānāmiti hālāhala ! tāta ! mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6612: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām” //
GK16visah__u:6624: kopoparaktānyapi kāminīnāṃ mukhāni śaṅkāṃ vidadhurna yūnām” //
GK16visah__u:6629: mīlite utkṛṣṭaguṇena nikṛśṭaguṇasya tirodhānam, iha tūbhayostulyaguṇatayā bhedāgrahaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6634: iha tu vastvantaraguṇenākrāntatā pratīyata iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6636: yathā--“hanta ! sāndreṇa rāgeṇa bhṛte 'pi hṛdaye mama /
GK16visah__u:6637: guṇagaura ! niṣaṇṇo 'pi kathaṃ nāma na rajyasi” //
GK16visah__u:6640: rājahaṃsa ! tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate” //
GK16visah__u:6641: pūrvatrātiraktahṛdayasaṃparkāt prāptavadapi guṇagauraśabdavācyasya nāyakasya raktatvaṃ na niṣpinnam,
GK16visah__u:6642: uttaratrāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi gaṅgāyamunāpekṣayā prakṛtasya haṃsasya gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃparke 'pi na tadrūpatā /
GK16visah__u:6645: kayāpi sūcyate bhahgyā yatra sūkṣmaṃ taducyate // VisSd_10.91 //
GK16visah__u:6649: puṃstvaṃ tanvyā vyañjantī vayasyā smitvā pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekha” //
GK16visah__u:6650: atra kayācitkuṅkumabhedena saṃlakṣitaṃ kasyāścitpuruṣāyitaṃ pāṇau puruṣacihnakhaḍgalekhālikhanena sūcitam /
GK16visah__u:6654: atra viṭasya bhrūvikṣepādinā lakṣitaḥ saṅketakālābhiprāyo rajanīkālabhāvinā padmanimīlanena prakāśitaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6658: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6664: “lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
GK16visah__u:6665: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ” //
GK16visah__u:6674: na cāyaṃ prasādākhyo guṇaḥ, bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatve tasyāhetutvāt /
GK16visah__u:6675: na cādbhuto rasaḥ, vismayaṃ pratyasya hetutvāt /
GK16visah__u:6681: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah__u:6686: yatpunarapratyakṣāyamāṇasyāpi varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ tatrāyamalaṅkāro bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visah__u:6689: yadvāpi prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhavet // VisSd_10.94 //
GK16visah__u:6717: dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt” //
GK16visah__u:6719: bhāvasya codaye saṃdhau miśratve ta tadākhyakāḥ // VisSd_10.96 //
GK16visah__u:6722: śrutvā kuto 'pi tvannama lebhire viṣamāṃ daśām” //
GK16visah__u:6725: salajjā cāntike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā” //
GK16visah__u:6727: “paśyetkaściccala capala ! re ! kā tvārahaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi /
GK16visah__u:6731: rasādayastu vācyavācakābhyāmupakāryā eveti na teṣāmaṅkāratā bhavituṃ yuktā” iti /
GK16visah__u:6733: apare ca--“rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkāratvaṃ mukhyato rūpakādau tu vācyādyupadhānam,
GK16visah__u:6742: yadi ca rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkṛtitvaṃ tadā vācakadiṣvapi tathā prasajyeta /
GK16visah__u:6744: aṅgatve tu dvitīyodāttālaṅkāraḥ” iti tadapi parāstam /
GK16visah__u:6747: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau pṛthagalaṅkārau /
GK16visah__u:6754: atra pāyādapāyāditi yamakam, saṃsāretyādau cānuprāsa iti śabdālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visah__u:6755: dvitīye pāde upamā, dvitīyārdhe ca rūpakamityarthālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visah__u:6758: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visah__u:6763: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visah__u:6776: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visah__u:6780: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah__u:6781: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visah__u:6787: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6789: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
GK16visah__u:6793: atra vadane locanasya sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatā, ambuje cāsaṃbhavādrūpakasya bādhakatā /
GK16visah__u:6794: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā bādhakaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6797: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16visah__u:6803: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visah__u:6810: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
GK16visah__u:6812: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
